idea-plugin.description:
This plugin enhances IntelliJ's support for Google Closure. It can determine missing/obsolete/duplicate 'goog.require' statements and offers corresponding quick-fixes. In addition, there is an inspection and quick-fix for usages of bracket notation (instead of dot notation) for accessing properties. Last but not least, there is a check & quickfix for swapped type annotation and parameters in JSDoc comments.
More info & source code: https://github.com/Dan1ve/ClosureInspectionsPlugin
idea-plugin.change-notes: - New inspection & fix: Swapped type annotation and parameter name after @param in JSDoc comments
